title: Enhancing Roles and Practical Competencies of Higher Education Instructional Designers (Self-Directed)

context.additional_context: Corporate education managers/leaders requiring practical competencies in higher education instructional design processes; smartphone-based learning environments considered

learning_goals: Explain the core roles of instructional designers in higher education (teaching support, content development, project management)
Apply various tools and techniques for online course design to practical settings
Establish a process for designing learning experiences considering instructor-student interaction

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
